description:
A turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects enemies around it and continues to fire bullets at the target until it runs out of bullets.

HP:30
MAX-AMMO:50
rounds per minute:60
RANGE:0-14
DAMAGE:18
TYPE:BULLET

A Shotgun turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects enemies around it and continues to fire bullets at the target until it runs out of bullets.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:40
MAX-AMMO:60
rounds per minute:40
RANGE:0-8
DAMAGE:24
TYPE:BULLET

A Taser turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects surrounding enemies and continues to fire electric blasts at the target until it runs out of ammunition.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:35
MAX-AMMO:30
rounds per minute:90
RANGE:0-3
DAMAGE:18
TYPE:Electrical

A Gatling gun turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects enemies in the vicinity and continues to fire bullets at high speed until there are no more bullets left for that target.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:55
MAX-AMMO:200
rounds per minute:200
RANGE:0-15
DAMAGE:12x5
TYPE:BULLET

A Flamethrower turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects surrounding enemies and continues to release flames until there are no more bullets at the target.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:50
MAX-AMMO:100
rounds per minute:120
RANGE:0-5
DAMAGE:4x2
TYPE:HEAT

A Rocket launcher turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects enemies in the vicinity and continues to fire missiles that explode until there are no more bullets at the target.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:50
MAX-AMMO:100
rounds per minute:50
RANGE:6-18
DAMAGE:20x5
TYPE:BULLET

A Railgun turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects enemies around it and continues to fire bullets that can snipe its target from a distance until it runs out of ammunition.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:50
MAX-AMMO:100
rounds per minute:60
RANGE:8-26
DAMAGE:10x10
TYPE:BULLET

A Shadow fang turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects enemies around it and continues to shoot bullets that generate darkness until it runs out of ammunition.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:25
MAX-AMMO:50
rounds per minute:60
RANGE:0-12
DAMAGE:5
TYPE:PURE

A Frost beam turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects enemies around it and emits a powerful beam of ice that freezes enemies until it runs out of ammunition.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:40
MAX-AMMO:120
rounds per minute:60
RANGE:0-13
DAMAGE:4x3
TYPE:COLD

An Acid splatter turret of mana created by magical power. It automatically detects surrounding enemies and continues to release a powerful acid liquid until it runs out of ammunition.
For ammunition you need [Mana Bullets].

HP:50
MAX-AMMO:120
rounds per minute:90
RANGE:0-6
DAMAGE:3x3
TYPE:ACID
